listings.title: AI Resume Builder Pro
listings.description: AI Resume Builder Pro is a smart web application that helps job seekers create professional resumes using AI. Features include: 1) AI-powered content suggestions 2) ATS-friendly templates 3) Real-time preview 4) Multiple format export (PDF, DOCX) 5) Keyword optimization for job descriptions 6) Cover letter generator.

listings.title: FitTrack Pro
listings.description: FitTrack Pro is a comprehensive fitness tracking application that combines workout planning, nutrition tracking, and progress monitoring. Features: 1) Custom workout builder 2) Meal planning with calorie counter 3) Progress photos and measurements 4) Integration with fitness wearables 5) Social community features.
